role.argrole: place arg0 pulls itself out of

example.parse: (IP (PP-TMP (P 自从) (LCP (DP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (NP-TMP (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 开始) (VP (VV 卖) (NP-OBJ (NN 地)))))) (DEC 的))) (DP (DT 那) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 天))))) (LC 起))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 六家人)) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 可) (VP (VV 自拔)))) (DEV 地)) (VP (VV 陷入) (LCP-OBJ (NP (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 场))) (NP (NN 金钱) (NN 梦魇))) (LC 中)))))
